remarks: Four times the inner product value ~ ipval3 , useful for simplifying certain proofs.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dipfval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
dipfval.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
dipfval.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
dipfval.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
dipfval.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ipval3.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
4ipval3 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( 4 x. ( A P B ) ) = ( ( ( ( N ` ( A G B ) ) ^ 2 ) - ( ( N ` ( A M B ) ) ^ 2 ) ) + ( _i x. ( ( ( N ` ( A G ( _i S B ) ) ) ^ 2 ) - ( ( N ` ( A M ( _i S B ) ) ) ^ 2 ) ) ) ) ) $.
